name: Terry's Favorite Easy Chicken Pie
author: Sunflower
summary: This pie is easy to make and is wonderful comfort food. This is my husband's favorite meal.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
½ (16 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
In a large mixing bowl combine soup and softened cream cheese
Pour chicken mixture into pastry-lined pie pan
Seal and cut steam vents in top
Cover edges of crust with aluminum foil to prevent overbrowning
Bake in preheated oven for 35 to 40 minutes
Remove foil halfway through baking to allow edges of crust to brown
Check often late in cooking time to ensure crust is not burning
